title: Lufthansa Cargo CL collaborates with Ferrari 296 GT3
subtitle: Lufthansa Cargo CL will provide comprehensive logistics support for the Ferrari 296 GT3, including transportation of racing cars, supply of repair parts, and rapid response in emergency situations. This collaboration not only enhances the competitiveness of the Ferrari 296 GT3 on the racetrack, but also sets a new benchmark for Lufthansa Cargo CL in the global racing logistics industry.
